name: Moto Bike Attack Racing
description:
Get ready to experience thrilling stunt bike attack racing game.Bike attack race is a bike racing simulator in which you will enjoy the real racing simulation experience with brand new heavy bikes.Dodge the highway traffic rush while beating the rival racers and win this death bike racing in no time. This extreme superbike racing game has real crazy bike sound effect and 3D graphics.Clear your checkpoints on the roads saving yourself in the time trial.Now kick and punch the bikers to free the roads from gangsters and maximize your fun. Perform stunts to relish your appetite for a thrill on the busy traffic roads.

Game Features:
• 3D view to have Realistic effects
• Good quality of sound to amuse the users
• smooth game play and realistic controls.
• Use Boosters to increase the speed and save your time
